metadata.titel_preek: Face to Face, Hand in Hand

kernfrasen: put your hand in the hand of the man from Galilee
What you sow does not come to life unless it dies
first fruits of those who have fallen asleep

dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SALVATION IS AN EXCHANGE OF ASSETS

cognitieve_implicaties: God is a person, not an abstract force
theologische_implicaties: Resurrection must be bodily to be meaningful
ethische_implicaties: Human relationships are the training ground for heaven
Physical care for others has eternal value
onbedoelde_consequenties: May exclude those with sensory impairments

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the conventional phrase by contrasting it with e-mail/Internet relationships.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully anchors the abstract concept of 'Resurrection' in the concrete domain of 'Physical Presence,' using the modern technology of e-mail as a foil.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: Seeds imply a natural, expected process; the Gospel accounts imply a terrifying, unnatural disruption.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Exchange' of sin for righteousness is framed as the mechanism that enables the 'Relationship' of love.

sterktes.beschrijving: Uses the 'Internet/Email' source domain to make the 'Face to Face' metaphor feel urgent and contemporary.
sterktes.voorbeeld: a lot of people thought they were having real relationships by e-mail when in fact there can be no real relationships without face-to-face contact.

risicos.beschrijving: The emphasis on 'warm hands' and 'beloved smiles' might lead to a overly materialistic view of the afterlife.
risicos.voorbeeld: she would never feel his warm hands again
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may struggle with the 'spiritual body' concept Paul actually argues for.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; establishes the need for 'presence' across time.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By using tragic imagery (Oklahoma City) to show that bodies are what we love.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Labeling it as a 'Hellenistic' or 'generic religious' idea rather than Christian.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the Apostles' Creed mentioned in the text.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the Relational/Physical domain, which is highly effective for an Easter message. It successfully moves from the 'Dead Metaphor' of 'Resurrection' to the 'Living Metaphor' of 'Physical Presence.' However, it leans heavily on the 'Man of Dust' (Source) while struggling to define the 'Man of Heaven' (Target) without falling back into economic exchange language.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Use the 'Radioactive Pottery' or 'Electric Shock' imagery from the Guatemalan art mentioned.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The resurrection is not a blooming flower; it is an electric shock to the system of the universe.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Distinguish between 'continuity of person' (seed) and 'discontinuity of power' (lightning).

entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Frame the exchange as a 'Gift' rather than a 'Swap' to maintain the Relational domain's priority.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To explain the 'New Heaven and New Earth' as a foundation rather than just a feeling.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to dismantle the 'Immortality of the Soul' schema and replace it with a robust, embodied theology of Resurrection.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'Guatemalan artist' description for its color, CMT analyzes it as a 'Schema Disruption' of the 'Peaceful Easter' trope.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's experiential learning, CMT focuses on how the 'Face to Face' metaphor provides the cognitive structure for the experience itself.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT reveals that the preacher's difficulty with Paul's 'seed' analogy is a conflict between the 'NATURAL PROCESS' and 'DIVINE INTERVENTION' source domains.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Put your hand in the hand
appendices.notities: The preacher uses the 'Economic' domain (exchange) primarily in the peroration to provide a sense of resolution.
